name: Gender Gender
description:
Gender Gender is made for Ludum Dare 32 game jam! Use your charms to win over enemies - turn into a guy to attract girl enemies, and turn into a girl to attract guy enemies!

Ludum Dare entry here

Art by Charlene Andrew
Coding by @oneseedfruit

Made in Unity Personal Edition
Sound: Bfxr

FIX 1
- Tweaked the jump sfx, sound won't be repeatedly played anymore
- Tweaked the movement, movements much more controlled now.
- Changed to 60 seconds per gameplay
